results.title: The Man Who Saves The World
results.original_title: Dünyayı Kurtaran Adam
results.overview: The film follows the adventures of Murat (Arkın) and Ali (Akkaya), whose spaceships crash on a desert planet following a battle, shown by using footage from Star Wars as well as Soviet and American space program newsreel clips. While hiking across the desert, they speculate that the planet is inhabited only by women. Murat does his "wolf whistle", which he uses on attractive women. However, he blows the wrong whistle and they are attacked by skeletons on horseback, which they defeat in hand-to-hand combat. The main villain soon shows up and captures the heroes, bringing them to his gladiatorial arena so they can fight. The villain tells them he is actually from Earth and is a 1,000 year old wizard. He tried to defeat Earth, but was always repelled by a shield of concentrated human brain molecules, which looks like the Death Star from Star Wars. The only way he can bypass this impenetrable defense is to use a human brain against it.

results.title: Darth Vader - Path of the Dark Side | Star Wars Galaxy of Adventures
results.original_title: Darth Vader - Path of the Dark Side | Star Wars Galaxy of Adventures
results.overview: Key moments and characters of the 'Star Wars' saga are reintroduced in short animations.

results.title: Luke Skywalker - The Journey of a Jedi | Star Wars Galaxy of Adventures
results.original_title: Luke Skywalker - The Journey of a Jedi | Star Wars Galaxy of Adventures
results.overview: Discover the amazing journey of Luke Skywalker from Tatooine farmboy to Jedi Knight: Watch Luke receive his lightsaber, fly his X-wing down the Death Star trench, and face the Emperor and Darth Vader! Plus, learn fun facts about X-wings, TIE fighters, and more!

results.title: Untitled Star Wars/David Benioff & D.B. Weiss Project
results.original_title: Untitled Star Wars/David Benioff & D.B. Weiss Project
results.overview: Plot unknown. Described as a series of 'Star Wars' films that will be separate from the episodic Skywalker Saga and Rian Johnson's trilogy.

results.title: Lego Star Wars: The Complete Brick Saga So Far
results.original_title: Lego Star Wars: The Complete Brick Saga So Far
results.overview: LEGO Star Wars is a series of TV Movies telling stories from the Star Wars universe using the distinctive characters from the world of LEGO and the animation style of the LEGO Star Wars computer games. Starting in 2005; the first film "Revenge of the Brick" was created to coincide with the theatrical release of Revenge of the Sith.

results.title: Star Wars Episode III: Revenge of the Sith Special Edition
results.original_title: Star Wars Episode III: Revenge of the Sith Special Edition
results.overview: A comedic "demake" of the third Star Wars prequel film using about eight actors, poorly-made costumes, shoddy special effects, and even worse acting than the original prequels.

results.title: How Star Wars Was Saved in the Edit
results.original_title: How Star Wars Was Saved in the Edit
results.overview: Joey Scoma demonstrates how Star Wars (1977), a potential disaster in its rough cut, was saved in the editing.

results.title: The Last Padawan: A Short Star Wars Story
results.original_title: The Last Padawan: A Short Star Wars Story

results.title: Star Wars Rebels: The Machine in the Ghost
results.original_title: Star Wars Rebels: The Machine in the Ghost
results.overview: The Ghost is pursued by TIE fighters. The trio of Hera, Kanan and Chopper must work together to defeat them.

results.title: The Force Is with Them: The Legacy of Star Wars
results.original_title: The Force Is with Them: The Legacy of Star Wars
results.overview: The Force Is with Them: The Legacy of Star Wars is a Video Documentary included in the 2004 DVD of the Star Wars Original Trilogy. It explained the impact of "Star Wars" on various directors and actors.

results.title: Star Wars Episode II: Attack of the Clones Special Edition
results.original_title: Star Wars Episode II: Attack of the Clones Special Edition
results.overview: A follow-up of Revenge of the Sith Special Edition using the same comedic "demake" style.

results.title: The Star Wars Suite – The Danish National Symphony Orchestra
results.original_title: The Star Wars Suite – The Danish National Symphony Orchestra
results.overview: On June 2017,  the Danish Broadcasting Corporation (DR) hosted three orchestral concerts called Galaxymphony which included some of the soundtrack from various space and sci-fi movies. This is their version of some of the Star Wars soundtrack across all seven movies.  The concert was hosted by Jakob Stegelmann and conducted by Antony Hermus. The performance was orchestrated by The Danish National Symphony Orchestra with help from the 'Camerata' and 'Hymnia' choirs. As told in the video, the host, Jakob Stegelmann, is very passionate about the Star Wars films and therefore evidently the main event of the concert. Therefore, I have shared this extra long video (what a horror it was to render) for you to enjoy.

results.title: Star Wars Episode III.I Turn to the Dark Side
results.original_title: Star Wars Episode III.I Turn to the Dark Side
results.overview: A reimagining of the Star Wars prequel trilogy edited into a single compelling movie, based on the structure conceived by actor Topher Grace. As a critique of episodes 1-3, many large plot pieces have been removed or changed to strengthen the core relationship between Anakin Skywalker and Padmé Amidala. More than 100 video and audio edits heighten the main character’s tragic fall from grace.

results.title: The Stories: The Making of 'Rogue One: A Star Wars Story'
results.original_title: The Stories: The Making of 'Rogue One: A Star Wars Story'
results.overview: The Making of 'Rogue One: A Star Wars Story'

results.title: Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens: The Story Awakens - The Table Read
results.original_title: Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens: The Story Awakens - The Table Read
results.overview: The table read of Star Wars VII

results.title: Turks in Space
results.original_title: Dünyayı Kurtaran Adam'ın Oğlu
results.overview: The year is 2055, and the universe is in a state of turmoil, awaiting the formation of a government that can establish universal peace. Until such a time, the Orion Union stands in its stead, an uneasy alliance made up not of planets, but of their individual states, overlorded by unruly gangs, short-sighted tyrants and hissing, domineering queens. In short, chaos reigns.

results.title: The Immortal Wars
results.original_title: The Immortal Wars
results.overview: Set in the future the world has been split into sectors, humans have captured deviants and force them to fight to the death. Madman Dominion Harvey hosts the immortal wars and televises the show to the entire planet. Trikalypse and fellow deviants will not only fight to survive, but to bring down Dominion Industries.

results.title: Star Warriors
results.original_title: Star Warriors
results.overview: Some Star Wars fans want to collect action figures... these fans want to be action figures! A tribute to the 501st Legion, a global organization of Star Wars costume enthusiasts, this insightful documentary shows how the super-fan club promotes interest in the films through charity and volunteer work at fundraisers and high-profile special events around the world.

results.title: Side by Side
results.original_title: Side by Side
results.overview: Since the invention of cinema, the standard format for recording moving images has been film. Over the past two decades, a new form of digital filmmaking has emerged, creating a groundbreaking evolution in the medium. Keanu Reeves explores the development of cinema and the impact of digital filmmaking via in-depth interviews with Hollywood masters, such as James Cameron, David Fincher, David Lynch, Christopher Nolan, Martin Scorsese, George Lucas, Steven Soderbergh, and many more.

results.title: The Beginning: Making 'Episode I'
results.original_title: The Beginning: Making 'Episode I'
results.overview: The entire process of making Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace (1999) are shown here in this documentary. From pre-production through post-production we get to see visual effects meetings, John Williams music sessions and even the storm that wiped out the pod-racers & props
